questions.title: 每天饭后散步对你的父母有益。
questions.answer: It's useful to have a walk after dinner for your parents every day.

questions.title: 报分数对激励我们班所有的学生都有帮助。
questions.answer: It's useful to encourage all students in our class by the way of offeringmarks.

questions.title: 多做练习对提高你的数学成绩有帮助。
questions.answer: It's useful to improve your math marks by doing more exercise.

questions.title: 多吃水果和蔬菜对减肥有用。
questions.answer: It is useful to eat a lot of fruit and vegetables.

questions.title: 学习理论而没有实践是无用的。
questions.answer: It will be useless to learn a theory without practice.

questions.title: 如果属于二度或三度烧伤，就必须立即把患者送去看医生或送往医院。
questions.answer: If the injuries are second or third degree burns, it is vital to get thevictim to the doctor or hospital at once.

title: ——多读书对提高你的阅读能力有帮助。
——我会按照你说的做。

answer.en: Reading more is useful to improve your reading ability.
I will do as you say.
It's useful to remove the tea stains by salt.
It's very useful, you're so smart.

title: ——每天跑步有利于健康。
——是的，我把它当成一件快乐的事情。

answer.en: It is healthy to run every day.
Yes, I consider it as a happy thing.

title: ——你能就如何练习英语口语给我一些建议吗？
——在日常生活中练习你的英语口语非常重要。

answer.en: Could you give me some advice on how to practise oral English.
It's very important for you to practiseyour oralEnglishindailylife.
